com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.interfaces

Interface Formula


  • public interface Formula
    Formula interface provides a foundation for integrating user defined functions with the system. Instructions to implementing this interface and deploying your custom Formula: - Your class must implement the Formula interface. - Pack your class into a proper JAR file - Rename the JAR file to path pointing to your class. Name should look like: Package Name + Class Name + .jar - Place your JAR file into the formulas Folder LaunchSetup.input_formulas_dir.
    Since:
    3.1
    Version:
    18/10/2011
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit

      • requiresMatrix

        boolean requiresMatrix()
        Check if calculations require a confusion matrix.
        Returns:
        true if requires matrix, false otherwise.
